data: Prior to and 60 minutes after each dose of rifampin
Once prior to beginning rifampin desensitization, prior to each dose of rifampin and daily for 2 days after completion of rifampin desensitization
Educate patient not to miss any doses or stop rifampin unless signs or symptoms of allergic reaction occur. If a dose is missed, the desensitization protocol may need to be started again
Provider to change desensitization start date and time using the 'start' field at the top of the PowerPlan if required
